settings.heroimage_paragraph_text: This ain’t your grandma’s sewing circle. This is needle and thread with serious street cred. Embroidery’s what you reach for when a design needs to rise up – literally. It’s threadwork that brings your logo to life in 3D. Tight stitches, bold texture, and colours that stay crisp from first wear to fiftieth.

settings.content_paragraph_text: We take your artwork or logo and transform it into a digital embroidery file – a blueprint that maps every stitch, thread colour, and direction. This step ensures your design holds its shape, colour, and detail when stitched onto fabric, no matter how complex.

Your garment is carefully placed into an embroidery hoop, keeping the fabric flat and taut. This prevents warping, puckering, or shifting during the stitching process, ensuring a smooth, pro-grade result every single time.

Once hooped and loaded, our multi-head embroidery machines kick into gear – laying down thread with pinpoint precision. Each needle is programmed to stitch at the perfect speed, depth, and tension. The result? Bold, clean threadwork that’s dimensional, durable, and straight-up beautiful.

After stitching, it’s detail time. We snip loose threads, apply a gentle steam press to set the design, and inspect every garment for thread tension, alignment, and overall finish before it leaves the garage.

settings.cta_heading_text: Want that tactile, pro-level finish that makes people lean in for a closer look?
settings.cta_paragraph_text: This is how you get it. We’ve dialled in the process to make sure your thread game is fresh, clean, and ready for whatever life (or your fans) throw at it.

settings.bento_paragraph_text: Embroidery is the must-do when print just doesn’t cut it. Whether it’s about brand impact, a clean finish, or that raised texture that begs to be touched, embroidery adds dimension, swagger, and unmistakable quality in one go.

settings.faq_cta_heading_text: Keen to see the full print line up?
settings.faq_cta_paragraph_text: Head this way to explore more print methods and find the right fit for your next project.

settings.contact_heading_text: Wanna touch it? That’s the point.
settings.contact_paragraph_text: Embroidery isn’t just something you see – it’s something you feel. If you’re chasing merch that stands up and stands out, shoot us the brief and let's get started.
